src:
【豪門爆姦情5】偷情還拍淫照與影片　元祖小開超愛炫耀婚姻幸福
05 Nov 2019, 21:58 by 娛樂組, 攝影組
歌手兼網路電商企業家安晨妤和「富二代」、元祖食品少東張劭緯結婚13年，表面一副甜蜜幸福模樣，沒想到日前卻驚爆婚變。主因是張劭緯結婚以來，背著老婆安晨妤偷歡數女，還拍下淫照與影片，而且不倫的其中一位對象，竟是與元祖敵對的大黑松小倆口千金邱威樺。



回顧兩夫妻以往恩愛的畫面，安晨妤以歌手身分發片時，老公張劭緯挺身站台，並誇說豪砸3千萬幫老婆圓夢；去年安晨妤跟羽球教練被本刊拍到互動曖昧，她解釋因作風較為洋派，並非外遇，老公張劭緯也曾在臉書上傳安晨妤的背影照，並寫道：「這是我牽手一輩子的女人，以前是、現在是、未來也是…」。


被爆與兒子羽球教練互動親密後，安晨妤（中）在臉書po出與老公（右）、教練（左）的3P同框照，以示清白。（翻攝自安晨妤臉書）

安晨妤並曾安排媒體參觀自住的豪宅，並介紹家中有一面牆，掛滿全家福的照片，並一臉幸福形容：「我和老公每年底就會把所有的照片洗出來，拼湊一幅畫，算是我們家這1年的回顧。」








除此之外，安晨妤豪宅裡也有掛上老公在峇里島求婚的照片、自己在夏威夷待產照片，還有更多的是一家出遊照片「紀念生活的點滴」；她透露，因為跟老公2人都很熱愛購物，「這也是我嫁給他的原因之一」「我們衣櫃等收藏空間都一人一半，自己空間自己管，不能塞就不准買」。
如今爆出腥事，對比當年安晨妤發片聊起豪門婚姻幸福小事、老公張劭緯的貼心及浪漫，一切顯得相當諷刺。
更新時間｜2019.11.05 11:46
text:
[Grandeur swindling love 5] stealing love and taking sluts and videos Yuanzu Xiaokai super love shows off marriage happiness
05 Nov 2019, 21:58 by Entertainment Group, Photography Group
The singer and online e-commerce entrepreneur An Chenxi and the "rich second generation", Yuanzu food Shaodong Zhang Weiwei married for 13 years, the surface of a sweet and happy appearance, did not expect a few days ago but shocked marriage. The main reason is that since Zhang Weiwei got married, she took her wife An Chen’s wife and sneaked a few women. She also photographed the lascivious photos and films, and one of the unbelievable objects was the big black pines and the two brothers Qiu Weihua who were hostile to the Yuanzu.



Looking back at the pictures of the two couples' past love, when An Chenyi distributed the film as a singer, her husband Zhang Yiwei stepped on the platform and boasted that he had a dream of tens of millions of his wife. Last year, An Chenxi and the badminton coach were interviewed by the magazine. She explained that because of her style, she was not an affair. Her husband Zhang Yiwei also uploaded an image of An Chenxi’s back on Facebook and wrote: "This is the woman I have been holding for a lifetime. It used to be, now and in the future...".


After being blasted and intimately interacting with his son's badminton coach, An Chenxi (middle) took a photo with his husband (right) and coach (left) in the face of the book to show innocence. (Reflected from An Chen's face book)

An Chenxi also arranged for the media to visit the self-occupied mansion and introduced a photo of the family with a wall and a happy face: "My husband and I will wash out all the photos at the end of the year and put together a piece of it." Painting is a review of our family for one year."








In addition, An Chen’s mansion also has photos of her husband’s proposal in Bali, her own photo in Hawaii, and more of a photo of the travel “Memorial of Life”; she revealed that because of her husband’s 2 people are very passionate about shopping. "This is one of the reasons why I am married to him." "We have half of the collection space in our wardrobe, and we have to manage our own space. If we can't plug it, we won't buy it."
Nowadays, there is an anecdote, and it is quite ironic to compare the intimate and romantic feelings of the marital happiness and the enthusiasm of the husband Zhang Weiwei.
Update time|2019.11.05 11:46
